item.title: Docking, by Martin Storey
item.description:
Docking, by Martin Storey

Rowan Yarns presents six exclusive online designs from their 2016 Spring Summer Collection. | Title: Coastal, Author: Rowan Yarns, Name: coastal, Length: 32 pages, Published: 2016-02-11T00:00:00.000Z

item.title: Teaching a new Mom to knit...
item.description:
Teaching a new Mom to knit...

An avid knitter, retired, owned by two adorable Westies...

item.title: Thursford, @RowanYarns magazine 59, stashed Vintage Denim :)
item.description:
Thursford, @RowanYarns magazine 59, stashed Vintage Denim :)

Knit this raglan sweater designed by Amy Herzog in Original Denim as featured in Rowan Knitting & Crochet Magazine 59. It has a stocking stitch body and simple textured sleeves making it suitable for the less experienced knitter.

item.title: New Year stash resolutions...
item.description:
New Year stash resolutions...

I've wanted to share my D'Arcy for a while now....but taking photos is problematic at the best of times...trying to get myself together, the hubby in photographer mode, the right light and the planets aligned. Can't be too tired or too rushed...or it just doesn't work.
